text: LGM can refer to: *Last Glacial Maximum *Left-Green Movement *Libre Graphics Meeting *Little Green Men Games *Let's Go Mets ;Little Green Men *Little Green Men, stereotypical portrayal of extraterrestrials *LGM-1, (for "Little Green Men") nickname of the first pulsar discovered *LGM-2, nickname for KIC 8462852 ;LGM - silo-launched surface-attack guided-missile *LGM-25 Titan **LGM-25 Titan I ICBM **LGM-25 Titan II ICBM *LGM-30 Minuteman ICBM *LGM-118 Peacekeeper ICBM
title: LGM
